name: Heal Order
description: You summon forth your underlings to heal your wounds. Regain 4d4 + MOVE hit points.
higherLevels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 3d6 at level 5, 5d6 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.

effect.name: Badly startles Pok√©mon that used a move of the same type.
effect.effect: Pokemon that used a move of the same contest type must make a CHA Saving Throw against Intimidation/Persuasion DC.
